description: Letter dated 26/11/2009 from Mark Lund (Chief Executive, COI) to Nick Hurd MP regarding: the cost of the Government's Media Monitoring Unit in 2008-09; the annual subscription fee paid to the unit; whether members of the Government's Media Monitoring Unit (MMU) are part of the Government Communication Network; and how many staff are employed by the Government's Media Monitoring Unit. 2 p.
